power.title: Acrid Decay
power.fluff: You extend your hand, and two sickly green bolts spiral out from your fingers, burning and devouring your enemies

section.text: If you target two creatures, you can choose to make one attack as a melee attack and the other as a ranged attack

section.name: Sorcerer-King Pact:
section.text: If you enhance this power with your Fell Might, you get the miss effect even when you target two creatures.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One or two creatures

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier acid and necrotic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to damage rolls until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: If you have combat advantage against the target, you deal additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Vestige Pact:
section.text: The penalty equals your Intelligence modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you only targeted one creature, you deal half damage and target takes half of the penalty to damage rolls.

power.title: All the Sand, All the Stars
power.fluff: You make your foe see all the grains of sand in the desert and all the stars in the heavens, and it reels in shock, unable to grasp infinity

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the blast

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d4 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: The attack deals additional psychic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: 2 + your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage, and the target cannot make opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Confounding Laughter
power.fluff: You create a haunting, maddening laughter about an enemy and the noise drives it mad with frustration, causing it to lash at anyone nearby

section.name: Target:
section.text: One enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You slide the target up to 2 squares. You can finish the attack against the target, even if you slide it outside of the attack's range.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target makes a melee basic attack as a free interrupt against an enemy you choose.
After its attack has been resolved, the target takes 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, or 3d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage if its attack missed.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: 2 + your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage.

power.title: Cyst of Darkness
power.fluff: With a whispered incantation, you plant a seed of chilling darkness within your enemy

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: When you use this power, you can choose to replace the cold damage and Cold keyword with fire damage and the Fire keyword.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Charisma modifier cold and necrotic damage.
At the start of your next turn, the target and each creature adjacent to it take cold and necrotic damage equal to your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: The cold and necrotic damage the target takes at the start of your next turn increases by your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: Before the target takes the damage, you can slide it a number of squares equal to 1 + one-half your Intelligence modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and only the target takes takes damage at the start of your next turn.

power.title: Death's Commands
power.fluff: To a living foe, your dark speech foreshadows your enemy's own death rattle; to the undead, your words sound like inescapable commands

section.name: Sorcerer-King Pact:
section.text: If you enchance this power with your Fell Might, the target counts as undead for this power.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: You gain a bonus to the attack roll against undead. The bonus equals one-half your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

If the target is undead, it cannot move closer to you while it remains dazed. Until the end of the encounter, the target must pay an additional square of movement for each square of movement that brings it closer to you.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: For you, devils count as undead for this power.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If the target is undead, it takes half damage, and until the end of your next turn it must pay an additional square of movement for each square of movement that brings it closer to you.

power.title: Deathboon
power.fluff: With the aid of your patron, you extend a thread through the target's lifeline and if the line snaps, some of the power returns to you

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude
You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll if the target is bloodied

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target is reduced to 0 hit points or less, it dies and you gain a +5 bonus to the first Warlock damage roll you make before the end of your next turn.

section.name: Warlock's Curse:
section.text: If the target is under your curse, you can gain this effect until the end of the encounter or until the target is no longer under your curse, whichever comes first.

power.title: Elder Constellation
power.fluff: A maddening pattern appears in the air, revealing a few flickering stars that preside over the end of everything, and turns into a wavering space instability that catches your foes

section.name: Target:
section.text: One or two creatures

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex
If you target only once creature, you can roll twice and use either result

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: You can choose to also deal cold damage to each creature adjacent to the target. The damage equals your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If you target two creatures and hit both targets, you can teleport them, swapping their positions.
If you target only one creature and hit it, you can teleport it a number of squares equal to 1 + one-half your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Far Realm Phantasm
power.fluff: You give brief life to the image of one of the creatures you periodically see in visions hungrily whispering your name, catching your target unprepared for the mind-wrenching vision that causes even your own breath to quicken

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target must spend a standard action to make a basic attack against the empty air before it can take other actions on its turn.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: The target takes a penalty to Will until the end of your next turn. The penalty equals one-half your Intelligence modifier (minimum -1).

section.name: Vestige Pact:
section.text: The target takes a penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. The penalty equals one-half your Intelligence modifier (minimum -1).

power.title: Hero's Arrow
power.fluff: You conjure a magic arrow and send it speeding toward an enemy, knowing that when it hits the target will be hurt and an ally aided

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma +3 vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Charisma modifier damage.
One ally adjacent to the target regains a number of hit points equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier.

section.name: Fey Pact:
section.text: You can teleport the ally a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier. The power gains the Teleportation keyword.

section.name: Vestige Pact:
section.text: Each ally adjacent to the target regains hit points.

power.title: Howl of Doom
power.fluff: You unleash a devastating shout that cracks stone and pulps flesh, and the supernatural terror that comes with the blast drives back your foes

section.name: Elemental Pact:
section.text: You can choose to attune this power with your current elemental affinity.
If you do, the power loses the Fear keyword, and the thunder damage and Thunder keyword are replaced by your current affinity's damage type and keyword.

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the blast

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d4 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you push the target 2 squares.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: You push the target a number of squares equal to 2 + one-half your Constitution modifier instead.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: 3 + your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus thunder damage, and half the number of squares pushed.

power.title: Infernal Moon Curse
power.fluff: The shimmer of pale, ghostly silver envelops your foe and lifts it up into the air, the sinister glimmer seeping into its body, a strange and deadly poison

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d8 + Charisma modifier poison damage, and the target is held immobilized 5 feet off the ground until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Fey Pact:
section.text: The target takes a penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. The penalty equals one-half your Dexterity modifier (minimum -1).

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: You deal additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: When the target is no longer immobilized, it is slowed until the end of your following turn.

power.title: Influence of Acamar
power.fluff: Crackling black energy shrouds your body as you briefly take on the least aspect of Acamar, a dark and distant star, and a the foe closest to you is struck by a stray bolt and pulled toward you

section.text: Using this power does not trigger opportunity attacks

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: The range is 10/20 instead.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One enemy closest to you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and you pull the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: 3 + Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus necrotic damage.

power.title: Lash of the Long Night
power.fluff: You lash out with a frigid wind to hold your foe at bay

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: If you have combat advantage against the target, it takes a penalty to its first saving throw against this effect equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Fey Pact:
section.text: You push the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.

power.title: Maggot Conduit
power.fluff: You invoke a conduit, which manifests as a writhing pit of maggots beneath your foes, holes devoured through space-time that crawl with the green-white maggots of the Worm

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude
You gain combat advantage against any prone target

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier acid damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage if the target is prone.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each prone target takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: The power gains the Zone keyword and the burst a zone of writhing maggots until the end of your next turn.

Any creature that enters the zone or ends its turn there takes acid damage equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

power.title: Mire the Mind
power.fluff: You assail your foe's mind with unreal images until it can see nothing else

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.
Choose a number of allies within 10 squares of you equal to your Dexterity modifier. The chosen allies are invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You are invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.
